description: Concatenates five attributes to create CAS_ID
No horizontal structure so structure percent is 100

translation_rules: countOfNotNull({dummy_sp10, dummy_sp11, dummy_sp12, dummy_sp20, dummy_sp21}, {dummy_u1, dummy_u2}, {dummy_np}, max_layer_number, 'TRUE')
description: Count layers up to max_layer_number which is set by the createMappingsView() function in the workflow. Layers are the canopy species, understory species, and non-forest types.
Maps source value to NAT_NON_VEG using list of values. Zero is caught and set to NULL_VALUE.
Maps source value to NON_FOR_ANTH using list of values. Zero is caught and set to NULL_VALUE.
Maps source value to NON_FOR_VEG using list of values. Zero is caught and set to NULL_VALUE.
